review: This has been the best thing we purchased on Amazon. I love the ability of watching Netflix in our bedroom and all the options on Amazon Prime. This has been a great alternative to buying a smart TV. Works great. Easy to use and set up. WIFI connectivity has been working fine. Also paired the App on my iPhone to it. Works well. Only had an issue once with it not connecting. I still have Comcast XFINITY box in my room. You can have both on the TV, each on its own HDMI.My mom also bought one after seeing mine. We have two in the house, the next floor up and no problems with connectivity with two in the house.

review: Was tired of paying high prices for satellite TV programming so I went with a basic package. We had one new smart tv in the living room and did not want to spend more money for one for a second TV. We have a basic hdtv with a USB port so we bought the Fire Stick for this tv so I could watch movies that my wife doesn't want to see while she is in other room watching her programs. Now I am not technically inclined but if you know how to use a remote or a cell phone to move through various pages you can use this. Saving lots of money and have lots of choices. Plus there's nothing sitting on counter, just a USB device that plugs into the TV.
